Elements.Name: isConsistentShadows
Description:
Fixes the shadow consistency issues found in the original version of the DLC.

Yoshis are exempt from this change.

Elements.Name: disablePipeTransition
Description:
Changes the pipe transition from the DLC animation to a fade out.

Recommended for playing in aspect ratios other than 16:9.

Groups.Name: ZeldaTweaks
Groups.DisplayName: The Legend of Zelda Zone Tweaks

Elements.Name: isLinkSonicFixed
Description:
Fixes the materials inside Link Sonic's mouth.

Thanks to M&M (https://gamebanana.com/members/1347950) for the original implementation of the fix.

Elements.Name: isStalbabyFixed
Description: Fixes the eye texture of the Stalbaby so there's no border around it.

Elements.Name: isWaterParticleFixed
Description: Fixes the splash particle being offset from the lake in the DLC.

Elements.Name: useUnusedGoalAnimation
Description: Enables the unused state for the goal object in DLC. The animation makes the Triforce hover above the player once the results play instead of being held by the player.

Elements.Name: disableChestLetterboxing
Description:
Disables the letterboxing when opening a chest in DLC.

Recommended for playing in aspect ratios other than 16:9.

Elements.Name: linkSonicPlayType
Description: Change where Link Sonic appears in the game.

Elements.Name: isAlwaysHeartLife
Description:
Makes the game always use the heart system from DLC.

This will make rings not scatter on damage as well, so they are just a collectable in this gamemode.

Elements.Name: isVirtualLinkSonic
Description:
Changes the Virtual Sonics in multiplayer mode to Link Sonic with different costumes.

Thanks to GPF (https://twitter.com/GPF_SCT) for the second player textures.
Elements.DisplayName: Play as Link Sonic in Multiplayer

Elements.Name: isNightsDlcEnabled
Description:
It's Sonic's worst nightmare!

Allows the 'NiGHTMARE Zone DLC' to be disabled.

Elements.Name: isYoshiDlcEnabled
Description:
Sonic steps into Yoshi's Island.

Allows the 'Yoshi's Island Zone DLC' to be disabled.

Elements.Name: isZeldaDlcEnabled
Description:
A link to a lost world.

Allows the 'The Legend of Zelda Zone DLC' to be disabled.
Elements.DisplayName: The Legend of Zelda Zone DLC

Elements.Name: is4StarBombWispDlcEnabled
Description:
The ultimate form of destruction.

Allows the '1x 5-Star Bomb Color Power DLC' to be enabled. Gives the player a 4-star Black Bomb Wisp capsules.

(The game only allows items to go up to 4 stars so this DLC is technically named incorrectly.)

Elements.Name: is25LivesDlcEnabled
Description:
A safety net for the risk-taking Sonic player.

Allows the '25 Lives DLC' to be enabled. Gives the player 5 4-star 1-UP capsules.

Elements.Name: isBombWispDlcEnabled
Description:
Devastate your enemies five times over.

Allows the '5 Black Bomb Color Powers DLC' to be enabled. Gives the player 5 1-star Black Bomb Wisp capsules.

Elements.Name: isGoldOmochaoDlcEnabled
Description:
A chao-tastic way to help out Sonic.

Allows the 'Rare Omochao RC Gadget DLC' to be enabled. Gives the player a Golden Omochao RC Gadget.

Elements.Name: isSonicOmochaoDlcEnabled
Description:
Help Sonic collect rings.

Allows the 'Rare Sonic Omochao RC Gadget DLC' to be enabled. Gives the player a Sonic themed Omochao RC Gadget.
Only enables Link Sonic in The Legend of Zelda DLC.
Enables Link Sonic everywhere, including the world map and circus minigames.
Disables Link Sonic in The Legend of Zelda DLC.
